Subjects: contemporary conditions; evils of the time; virtues; women, authors; ballads
_description: ‘Balade fet de la Reygne Katerine Russell’ — two 8-line and two 7-line stanzas

CamTCC921.First Lines:
Slombryng Ryhgt thoutefull ful of vnkyndenesThat now haþe
                    Reyne & dominacyun…
CamTCC921.Last Lines:
…Whos hey nobeles in euery cuntreyAdew the curt Right gentyl
                    large & fre
CamTCC921.Attributed Author: Balade fet de la Reygne Katerene Russell
CamTCC921.Attributed Title: Balade fet de la Reygne Katerene Russell
CamTCC921.Editions:
Cohen,  Helen Louise. 
             The Ballade.
         New York: Columbia UP, 1915: 290-1.
